data.quote: There's no greater effort than the least effort.
data.author: Kayambila Mpulamasaka

data.quote: If you don’t like someone’s story, write your own
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: A vision on its own is not enough. Hard work & dedication is required to make that vision a reality.
data.author: Strive Masiyiwa

data.quote: If you don’t have ambition, you shouldn’t be alive.
data.author: Aliko Dangote

data.quote: No matter where you’re from, your dreams are valid.
data.author: Lupita Nyong’o

data.quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly.
data.author: Langston Hughes

data.quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: Have a vision of excellence, a dream of success, and work like hell.
data.author: Dr. Samuel DuBois Cook

data.quote: If you don’t have confidence, you’ll always find a way not to win.
data.author: Carl Lewis
